page.title: 18CUSTOMS
page.content: The West country activity of{Skittling is also a popular local custom.This is quite different to the game played in Skittle Alleys called "Ten Pin Bowling".Skittling is played at a local Public House in a long alley with wooden almost spherical balls..unless the alley is an old one in which case the balls become almost cylindrical..which are rolloed against wooden skittles.These,on being knocked down are set up again by a {"sticker-up"}.who will be paid in cash or drinks at the end of the evening! The evening also usually involves a meal which can vary from a simple buffet to an elaborate two or three course meal.The game is enjoyed by a variety of ages and by both sexes. {Wassailing}..the annual blessing of cider trees is also a local custom indulged by some(Taunton Cider workers
